name: Lost On Jupiter
storyline:
As a crew and their ship approaches the gas giant, Jupiter, they find themselves suddenly being pulled in by... something. They know not by what, and they have but a few moments to prepare; the ship not taking long before ramming through the clutter of debris and storms surrounding this unknown land.

It is now up to you, the cadet, born from the journey to the new land, to go forth and find what remains of the crewmates after crashing down onto the inner-world.

With your trusty AI, technology, and your wits on hand, you must build up a camp and base of operations before embarking on a search.

Will you survive the onslaught of the growing threat, or will you be unable to escape from this once empty ball of gas? Only time will tell, and only you can find your way out while... Lost On Jupiter!
summary:
A 2D side-scrolling survival base-building survival game!

Explore the unknown lands inside of the gas giant, Jupiter.
Expand and build a base of operations for safety.
Exploit the new mineral to fuel and create your machines.
Exterminate the growing horde of enemies as they outnumber you more and more every day.
